subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: After 18 months of mostly static labor negotiations, N.B.A. owners and players reported progress on a key item, but they remain far apart on the financial framework of a new deal.
snippet: After 18 months of mostly static labor negotiations, N.B.A. owners and players reported progress on a key item, but they remain far apart on the financial framework of a new deal.
